chinese: 偿还（钱款或债务）
我每个月都要还买新房的分期贷款。
english: I repay the loan which I borrowed for my new house in monthly installments

chinese: n.交战状态
军队驻扎在边境，这被邻国视为想交战的表
english: Troops being stationed at the border was considered a show of militancy by their neighbors

chinese: n. 治疗，疗法
她的手受伤了，正在接受治疗。
english: She is receiving treatment for a hand injury

chinese: n.社会学
社会学是一门研究不同社会怎样运作的学科。
english: Sociology is the study of how different societies work

chinese: 以.（乌、直升机）盘旋，翱翔；（人）逗留在附近，徘徊
宇宙飞船正在水面上盘旋。
english: The spaceship is hovering over the water

chinese: n.房产；财产；特性；性能
他终于攒了足够的钱来置办一处房产。
english: He had finally saved enough money to buy a property

chinese: adj.单调的，无聊的
我的早餐非常单调，每天都吃馒头。
english: My breakfast routine is so monotonous, I eat steamed bread every day

chinese: adv. 疯狂地
她忙得不可开交，因为她有非常多的任务要
english: She is working frantically, because she has so many tasks to do

chinese: 凶.阻碍，妨碍，阻塞，堵塞
路障阻碍了道路。
cd）. 相同的，同一的 n.完全相同的事
这一排房屋完全相同。
english: All of the buildings in this row are identical

chinese: ad）.吸引人的，容貌出众的；显著的，突出的
这只猫最吸引人的是它雪白的长毛。
english: The most striking feature of this cat is its long snow-white hair

chinese: n.臭名昭著
他因叛国而至今声名狼藉。
english: His treason gained him notoriety which has lasted even to this day

chinese: n.表面；外表，外观 Y 浮出水面
汤的表面有一些油花。
english: There is some oil on the surface of the soup

chinese: m.障碍；屏障；隔阂
这条路被一个路障封锁了。
english: The road was closed by a barrier

chinese: n.缺点，短处
这种狗的缺点是它们的腿太短了。
english: A shortcoming of this kind of dog is that their legs are too short

chinese: m， 天文台，气象台，瞭望台
那个天文台是为了观察夜空中的星体而建造的。
english: The observatory was built to observe stars at night
